definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: Mr Wakshlag describes it as "a hit-saving machine".
sentences.chinese: 瓦克施莱格先生形容它为一部“热播回放机”。

sentences.english: By going low-level, you can play back the individual components of a mouse click.
sentences.chinese: 通过进入低级，您可以回放一个鼠标点击分解动作。

sentences.english: So what would an instant-replay system look like?
sentences.chinese: 那么，即时回放系统是什么样子呢？

sentences.english: Power loss in the inducer would trigger the deck's playback circuit.
sentences.chinese: 一旦引导器断电，终端的回放电路就会被触发。

sentences.english: When it finishes, the Playback Log file should open and show that everything passed.
sentences.chinese: 执行完毕后，回放日志文件应打开并显示发生的一切。

sentences.english: We can see that from the replays from six different angles.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以从六个不同的角度观看这段回放。

sentences.english: Finally, check for native video playback.
sentences.chinese: 最后，检测本地视频回放。

sentences.english: Participants' presentation will be video-recorded and can be played back for critique.
sentences.chinese: 学员将被录像，这样可以回放，便于提出批评和建议。

sentences.english: This paper presents a method to realize the storage and playback of multi-video and audio file.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种实现多路音视频文件的存储和回放的方法。

sentences.english: To perform recording, overdubbing, and playback, press the pedal as shown in the diagram.
sentences.chinese: 要进行录音，配音和回放，按图中所示的踏板。

sentences.english: Completed a sub-system to capture and review the anterior segment image.
sentences.chinese: 设计并实现了眼前节图像采集和回放子系统。

sentences.english: Defines the playback order during presentation.
sentences.chinese: 在放映时规定回放顺序。

sentences.english: IIC-bus controlled dual Dolby B-type noise reduction circuit for playback applications.
sentences.chinese: IIC总线控制回放应用双杜比B型降噪电路。

sentences.english: I think I replayed it 4 times?
The yesterday single tune, today as before playbacks.
sentences.chinese: 昨日的单曲，今日依旧回放。

sentences.english: The system also provides quick, after-action reviews of just-completed exercises.
sentences.chinese: 系统同时还能提供刚刚结束的演习的快速回放评估。

definition: to scout for a tour operator/to reconnoiter a potential tour itinerary/(tennis) to commit a foot fault
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
fragment (of speech etc)/extract (from book etc)/episode (of story etc)
to replay/to rerun/(agriculture) to reseed/to oversow
